title: Star Guardian Quiz Question
body: So i bought the Poppy Hammer icon right away when it came out, because i'm a Poppy main.  I proceeded to take the star guardian quiz, and got the Poppy Hammer icon because we are soulmates.  Will i just not get an icon from the quiz? or can i get refunded for the one i bought?

replies.body: Thank You so much i appreciate it a lot!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You guys rock by the way

The icon you get is the same, regardless of who you discover through the quiz.  The quiz icon is exclusive, and not available through the store.  I hope that helps clear things up!

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e34Xpc6pkyo/V_cH9sQjjwI/AAAAAAAA-8w/veJuYmCczTgCS2YH05wUNU-8kLrJLNpwgCLcB/s640/6756754.jpg
